Apple Macbook Intel 2.40 GHz 4 GB 250 GB 13" MC516LL/A White Laptop 886389089160 

This MacBook sells for about $250.00

It’s an older model but it still has a fair bit of ram at 4GB and you can upgrade the RAM to 8GB for about $50.00 or less to max out the ram on this 13 inch white Macbook.

The drive is okay, but it’s a spinning drive so you might see some benefit from a SSD drive. A 250GB ssd is about $100. 

The big question would be is it worth it to upgrade this computer further?

Chances are you will also need a new battery and then you’re looking at about $400.00 plus for a Mac that’s discontinued long ago. You might also need a battery and this would cost another twenty bucks or so too

This one does come in the original box and seems to be in good shape.

June 21, 2017 ·
